snippet.title: PC Longplay [112] Grandia II (Part 1 of 13)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

Had this game on the dreamcast but never finished so thought i'd record the PC version. I'm getting a few bugs in the game that mainly occur near the start. Music sometimes cuts out, certain in battle fmv don't fully show and sometimes the graphics pause for awhile. The story fmvs are low quality compared to the gameplay parts since the files are low resolution. 

I cut most of the battles out, except at the start of the video where I forgot. Not completed yet so I dont know when this will all be up. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
